statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={170.4}{e}^{{{0.0451}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0451}}\approx{1.046132467925}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.046132467925}-{1}={0.046132467925021}\approx{0.0461} and the percent is 4.61.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
